pageContext.claim: “I would love to run against him [Michael Bloomberg]. He’s been fighting me hard. He spent $100 million against me -- that didn't work. He spent a lot of money last night against Cindy Hyde-Smith. That didn't work out so well.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump made these comments in an interview with the New York Post, which pointed out, "Overall, Bloomberg’s Independence USA PAC spent $110 million in support of Democratic candidates, who won 21 of their 24 races." That's a great return for Bloomberg. The Post also noted that "Bloomberg donated $2,700 in support of" Hyde-Smith's opponent in Mississippi. That's a drop in the bucket for him.
